content: In the current digital technology era, blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies have become inevitable. And bitcoin is the first and most popular cryptocurrency to date. So what is bitcoin, how is it created, what benefits does it have become a great concern of the whole society. Movies about bitcoin were born to help us have a more objective view of cryptocurrencies and its impacts on the global economy and society:|Film name|Link|Type|Language|Description||The Rise And Rise Of Bitcoin|Link|Youtube|English|a 2014 documentary film directed by Daniel Mross about the significant rise of the cryptocurrency Bitcoin.||Bitcoin: The End of Money As We Know It|Link|Youtube|English|A documentary that explores the birth and development of Bitcoin and its potential to change the way we understand money and the financial system....||Banking On Bitcoin|Link|Youtube|English|Focuses on the significant rise of the Bitcoin cryptocurrency and the changes it brings to the global financial system...||The Bitcoin Gospel|Link|Youtube|English|Includes a series of interviews with financial experts, Bitcoin developers, and users, explaining how Bitcoin works and its importance in the digital age. It also explores the benefits of Bitcoin, including transparency, security, and reduced transaction costs...||The Bitcoin Experiment |Link|Youtube|English|Is a short documentary that introduces Bitcoin - the world's most popular cryptocurrency - and how it works, as well as some reasons why it has become a store of value and medium. Payment facilities are accepted worldwide...||Magic Money  |Link|Youtube|English|Magic money is a documentary about the cryptocurrency Bitcoin. The film explains the origin of Bitcoin and how it works as a digital currency. It also analyzes the pros and cons of Bitcoin, and the challenges it faces in the future...||The Bitcoin Story |Link|Youtube|English|The bitcoin story is a short documentary about the founder of Bitcoin – Satoshi Nakamoto – and why he created this digital currency...||The Bitcoin Phenomenon |Link|Youtube|English|The Bitcoin Phenomenon is a short documentary that explains how Bitcoin works and the benefits of using it...||Bitcoin In Uganda |Link|Youtube|English|Bitcoin in Uganda is a short documentary about the use of Bitcoin in Uganda, a country located in East Africa. The film follows a group of Bitcoin developers who travel to Uganda to find out how locals are using Bitcoin to solve their financial problems...||Bitcoins In Argentina |Link|Youtube|English|Bitcoins In Argentina is a short documentary about how Bitcoin has been used in Argentina, a South American country facing inflation and financial crisis...||Bitcoins Liberating Organic Farmers |Link|Youtube|English|Bitcoins Liberating Organic Farmers is a short documentary about how Bitcoin has helped organic farmers in Costa Rica and Nicaragua...||Ulterior States  |Link|Youtube|English|Ulterior States is a documentary about the history and potential of Bitcoin and blockchain technology...||The Blockchain And Us  |Link|Youtube|English|The Blockchain and Us is a short documentary about the development and potential of blockchain technology...||Bitcoin: Beyond the Bubble |Link|Youtube|English|Bitcoin: Beyond the Bubble is a documentary about the history, potential and challenges of the Bitcoin digital currency.|Banking on Africa: The Bitcoin Revolution (2020) |Link|Youtube|English|“Banking on Africa: The Bitcoin Revolution” is a documentary about the development of Bitcoin and digital currency in Africa, focusing on events and users in Zimbabwe, Uganda and South Africa.|Unfriended: Dark Web (2018) |Link|Youtube|English|“It's story is about a guy or a girl I can't remember it well but they found a laptop in a cafe where the guy works and they opened it out of their curiosity. The laptop has a cryptocurrency wallet that has a lot of money so they are having second thoughts to return it to the owner.And that's where their nightmare begins when they explored the laptop files..If you know a good movie about bitcoin, please share it for everyone to watch and learn!

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Didn’t realize there was so many of these Bitcoin movies out there.I remember the first time that Bitcoin was mentioned on television was a show called The Good Wife. And this was very very early like 2012 or so. I am actually surprised they decided to use Bitcoin since it was so new. It probably brought fame due to that one episode.

comments.author: Lorence.xD
comments.body: I thought it was just a clickbait since common movies are 1 hour long. But dang I clicked the links and find out there's a lot of sources of Bitcoin movies that are actually free. These list are so many so it took a long time to gather these information so salute to the OP. I always find a series or movies mentioning Bitcoin so I think it is a good advertisement to Bitcoin as well like the series Euphoria. Since the girl (Kat) want to receive some payment anonymously so her fans used Bitcoin so she took advantage for it without revealing her identity.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: To be honest, I didn't know that there were so many Bitcoin movies. That's impressive! I've seen about two or three of them so far, and I think one of them is also available on Netflix. "Trust No One" isn't on the list, but it was a good movie. I've also watched "Banking on Bitcoin" which is a really interesting film.IMHO, movies related to Bitcoin are really good because they can help people learn about it through these documentaries and maybe even inspire them to start investing in Bitcoin and crypto. It's like promoting Bitcoin and crypto in general through movies which is great because I'm sure many people enjoy watching movies and would like to discover new things each time.

comments.author: GazetaBitcoin
comments.created_time: June 04, 2023, 10:29:28 AMLast edit: June 04, 2023, 11:20:47 AM by GazetaBitcoin
comments.body: Excepting the movies already mentioned here, I would also like to mention 3 Bitcoin documentaries which are very interesting:Deep WebMagic Money - The Bitcoin RevolutionBitcoin: Shape the FutureFirst one talks also about Silk Road saga.Third one is first Bitcoin documentary made in Asia and many iconic figures appear in the film, such as Jihan Wu or executives of ViaBTC or other Asian crypto exchanges. Perhaps the most fascinating character from this documentary is a trader, whose face and voice are obscured, which brings more mystery to the movie. Among others, this trader also explain how he made his "first barrel of gold".

comments.body: Wow...this is great,I never knew that there are a lot of movies and documentary on bitcoin. The movies will speak louder than voice and people from different place will also watch the movie and that is how bitcoin awareness spreads.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: I'm surprised that there are so many movies about bitcoin, and looking at some of the comments, I can somewhat understand some of the issues about whether they are really talking about bitcoin, or just using bitcoin as a gimmick. any other. Media, entertainment, education abound, and the fact that bitcoin is appearing more and more in the places we observe is a somewhat positive signal, but does not mean that the information is there. share with the right goal, many things only distort the view of those who are new and outside of the field.

You needn't worry about the distortion of information, there's a lot of smart people out there that can filter out the bad information about bitcoin.They're not movies OP, most of the titles that you've listed are documentaries and they're pretty different from a movie, it's just semantics though so who cares? comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Quote from: GazetaBitcoin on June 04, 2023, 10:29:28 AMMagic Money - The Bitcoin RevolutionI have witnessed this, and this film truly deserves to be called a documentary. In the future, when Bitcoin becomes widely recognized, I believe this film will serve as the initial evidence of Bitcoin's development and its widespread adoption by people around the world. In the film, we can see various use cases of Bitcoin in different countries, as well as its acceptance by merchants such as hotels, dentists, and more.

comments.author: phuhuyxyz
comments.body: For newbies like me, movies like this are very valuable. Because it helps me see that bitcoin has been accepted in many places, in many areas of life and business. That is a solid premise for bitcoin, a cryptocurrency to grow and play a big role in people's lives in the world.

comments.author: ilovealtcoins
comments.body: Quote from: phuhuyxyz on June 11, 2023, 06:17:20 AMFor newbies like me, movies like this are very valuable. Because it helps me see that bitcoin has been accepted in many places, in many areas of life and business. That is a solid premise for bitcoin, a cryptocurrency to grow and play a big role in people's lives in the world.Do you want to know if bitcoin is accepted in many places and areas of life and business? You need to capture information every day about bitcoin. Just because bitcoin is mentioned in a movie doesn't mean it's popular, the two have nothing to do with it. Filmmakers aim to take advantage of dramas, scandals, or hot events to make movies, and profit is what they aim for. They are not good enough to make a propaganda movie about the popularity of bitcoin.
